Package pcb.uwu.core

Interface Amount<A extends Amount<A>>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - the concrete type of the Amount
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BigDecimal2DAmount, BigDecimal3DAmount, BigDecimalAmount

    public interface Amount<A extends Amount<A>>
    Represents an amount, or fundamental.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  Amount.Dimension<A>

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        BigDecimal getValue​()
        The scalar representation of this Amount. If the Amount is uni-dimensional it returns the underlying Amount. If the Amount is multi-dimensional it returns the norm of the Amount.
        Returns:
        the underlying value

      • getValue

        BigDecimal getValue​(Amount.Dimension<A> dimension)
        The scalar representation of this Amount. If the Amount is uni-dimensional it returns the underlying value. If the Amount is multi-dimensional it returns the value of the selected dimension.
        Parameters:
        dimension - the dimension to consider
        Returns:
        the underlying value

      • getScale

        int getScale​()
        The scale of this Amount. If the Amount is uni-dimensional it returns it's scale. If the Amount is multi-dimensional it returns the largest scale of it's individual dimensions.
        Returns:
        the scale of the Amount

      • withScale

        A withScale​(int scale,
            RoundingMode roundingMode)
        Set the scale of the Amount. If the Amount is multi-dimensional all dimensions will be affected with the new scale.
        Parameters:
        scale - the new scale to set
        roundingMode - the rounding mode
        Returns:
        a new Amount with the new scale

      • plus

        A plus​(A other,
       MathContext mathContext)
        Sum amount.
        Parameters:
        other - the Amount to add
        mathContext - the maths context to consider
        Returns:
        a new Amount representing this + other

      • minus

        A minus​(A other,
        MathContext mathContext)
        Subtract amount.
        Parameters:
        other - the Amount to subtract
        mathContext - the maths context to consider
        Returns:
        a new Amount representing this - other

      • multipliedBy

        A multipliedBy​(BigDecimal other,
               MathContext mathContext)
        Multiply by a scalar.
        Parameters:
        other - the scalar value to multiply by
        mathContext - the maths context to consider
        Returns:
        a new Amount representing this × other

      • dividedBy

        A dividedBy​(BigDecimal other,
            MathContext mathContext)
        Divide by a scalar.
        Parameters:
        other - the scalar value to divide by
        mathContext - the maths context to consider
        Returns:
        a new Amount representing this ÷ other

      • pow

        A pow​(int n,
      MathContext mathContext)
        Elevate to power.
        Parameters:
        n - the exponential factor
        mathContext - the maths context to consider
        Returns:
        a new Amount representing thisⁿ

      • translated

        A translated​(Function<BigDecimal,BigDecimal> transformation)
        translate with scalar function If the Amount is multi-dimensional all dimensions will be translated individually
        Parameters:
        transformation - a function representing a generic transformation from scalar to scalar
        Returns:
        a new Amount with the transformed value

      • isZero

        boolean isZero​()
        Returns:
        true if this Amount is zero, false otherwise
